name: synchrotron
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a circular particle accelerator (= a machine that makes very small pieces of matter move very fast) in which the matter almost reaches the speed of light: The facility's synchrotron is a massive, ring-shaped machine that accelerates subatomic particles almost to the speed of light, producing synchrotron radiation. The synchrotron was expected to generate light beams around 10,000 times more brilliant than existing sources.
